Text.Value: Leave.
Glory... we search... for the Adamantine Forge...
Do you know where to find the Forge?
What was your business down here?
How did you die?
... with spectator... won't... have gone far... hah... hahaha...

EditorData.NodeContext: Ugly wheezing dead laugh - he's alluding to the fact that he petrified his friend/rival in stone

Text.Value: ... book... disguised ... by magic...
What were you fighting over?
What is the Adamantine Forge?
Dhourn knows... but cannot tell...
Where can I find this Dhourn?
'We'? Who were the others?
Xargrim... conjurer... seeker...
*The corpse does not stir. It will answer no more questions.*
*The corpse regards you lifelessly.*
Who are you?
*The spell's power wanes. You can ask no more questions.*
Battle... with rival... summoned spectator...
What is this book I found next to you?
... the secret... to mastering the Adamantine Forge...
What was your knowledge of the Forge?
... secret... to its operation...
... Filro... Dhourn... each held knowledge... none... would share...
... lost workshop... of Silouv Yali... finest weapons... in all creation...

Synopsis: Xargrim is one of three drow wizards who was looking for the Adamantine Forge. Friends turned rivals, these wizards each compete to find the forge, trying to steal the knowledge of the others as they go. Xargrim ambushed one of his fellows and set a spectator on him, but the strain of the ritual killed him.
